name: Asteroids (itch) (SergiM27)
description:
*If you want to play this game in the browser,  play it on fullscreen :)... trust me.*

Asteroids is a simple game that involves controlling a spaceship and shooting asteroids that come your way. As you progress through the game, the asteroids come faster and in a larger amount, so the challenge of avoiding them becomes greater. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible by destroying the asteroids and avoiding collision with them.

Controls:

W/Up Arrow: Move the ship forwards

A and D/Left and Right arrow: Rotate the ship

Space or Mouse Button Left: Shoot
